results.question: What does it mean to say that an event has a timebox?
results.correct_answer: The event can take no more than a maximum amount of time.
incorrect_answers: The event must happen by a given time.
The event must happen at a set time.
The event must take at least a minimum amount of time.

results.question: When many Scrum Teams are working on a single product, what best describes the Definition of Done?
results.correct_answer: Each Scrum Team defines and uses its own, the differences are discussed and reconciled during a hardening Sprint
incorrect_answers: The Scrum Masters from each Scrum Team define a common Definition of Done.
Each Scrum Team uses its own, but must make their definition clear to all other teams so the differences are known.
All Scrum Teams must have a Definition of Done that makes their combined work potentially.

results.question: Several Sprints into a project, the Product Owner tells the Scrum Master that a key stakeholder just started using the product. The stakeholder is unhappy with the quality of the product. What are two good options for the Scrum Master?
results.correct_answer: Encourage the Product Owner to put quality specifications on the Product Backlog and express the stakeholder’s concern to the Developers
incorrect_answers: Coach the Product Owner on how to talk with the Developers about this concern.
Wait to bring this up until the Sprint Retrospective.
Explain to the Product Owner that it is up to the Developers to decide on acceptable quality standards.
Bring the concern to the testers to improve how the Product is verified

results.question: The length of a Sprint should be:
incorrect_answers: Short enough to keep the business risk acceptable to the Product Owner.
Short enough to be able to synchronize the development work with other business events.
No more than one calendar month.

results.question: Which of these countries remained neutral during World War II?
incorrect_answers: United Kingdom
France
Italy

results.question: Who won the 2015 Formula 1 World Championship?
incorrect_answers: Nico Rosberg
Sebastian Vettel
Jenson Button

results.question: How many flagship monsters appear in Monster Hunter Gernerations?
Which Animal Crossing game was for the Nintendo Wii?
incorrect_answers: Animal Crossing: New Leaf
Animal Crossing: Wild World
Animal Crossing: Population Growing!

results.question: Which Kirby game first introduced Copy Abilities?
incorrect_answers: Kirby Super Star
Kirby's Dream Land 2
Kirby's Dream Land

results.question: When was Gangnam Style uploaded to YouTube?
When was Gangnam Style uploaded to YouTube?
